body_html:
Ok, it is basically the same out of memory issue what people with GPUs 2-4GB VRAM encounter. The I5-Win Machine has only 6GB of RAM and about 8GB are needed to test MNIST quickly all at once. Ubuntu was an I7 16GB RAM, so no problem.

Solution to the problem: feed in batches. Recommendation: (I5,6GB ) batchsize=5000, and (QuadroK620,2GBVram) batchsize=1000. After that use numpy.mean to get the overall accuracy.
